quote: Because you can't be as in love as we were and not have it invade your bone marrow. Our kind of love can go into remission, but it's always waiting to return. Like the world's sweetest cancer.
quote_letters: BECAUSE YOU CANT BE AS IN LOVE AS WE WERE AND NOT HAVE IT INVADE YOUR BONE MARROW OUR KIND OF LOVE CAN GO INTO REMISSION BUT ITS ALWAYS WAITING TO RETURN LIKE THE WORLDS SWEETEST CANCER
